definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
suspense in a movie, play etc/concern for sb's welfare
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to think of/to long for/to miss
to keep as a souvenir/to recall fondly

sentences.english: All the old lady did was quote a scripture to you.
sentences.chinese: 這位剩女所做的就是念了一段經。

sentences.english: It was in the course of his reading that Magnus caught the sound of his name.
sentences.chinese: 曼克奈斯就在他念的當兒，聽見了自己的名字。

sentences.english: I hear him chuckling to himself as he read that funny article.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到他一策念那篇有趣的文致一邊柔氫地笑。

sentences.english: The little Indians were murmuring incantations and showing off their beautiful costumes in jumps.
sentences.chinese: 小印第安人念着口訣，一跳一跳的展示着美麗服裝。

sentences.english: I study English by reading it every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我是通過每天早晨念英語來學習它的。

sentences.english: Well, I can’t pronounce the name of the restaurant, but I met the owner. His name is Lauri Nilsson.
sentences.chinese: 我不會念它的店名，但我遇見它的老闆。

sentences.english: Walking is the best timing for walking practice.
sentences.chinese: 走路是經行念真經最好的時機。

sentences.english: It is always not until before bed that I realize homework is not finished.
sentences.chinese: 總是要等到考試以後才知道該唸的書還沒有念。

sentences.english: Is this how everyone did their University studies?
sentences.chinese: 大學都是這麼念出來的嗎？

sentences.english: I marveled why he left college to join the army.
sentences.chinese: 我不能理解他爲什麼不念大學而去從軍。

sentences.english: Don't read the past, not for the future, cherish now.
sentences.chinese: 不念過往，不爲未來，珍惜現在。

sentences.english: It wstipuls a precious moment I didn't wish to move.
sentences.chinese: 那一刻云云珍貴以至於我沒有念挪動轉移半步。

sentences.english: Am I continually separating myself to consider God every day of my life?
sentences.chinese: 我是否每天不斷地獻出自己，只以神爲念？

sentences.english: After six months, I couldn't see the value in it.
sentences.chinese: 六個月後，我看不出念這個書的價值何在。

sentences.english: These compost tumblers have been built to save you time and work.
sentences.chinese: 這些堆肥念着已建成挽救你的時間和工作。

definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to read silently/to mouth (the words of a prayer etc)/to say to oneself/to contemplate inwardly
to read out/to recite/to remember sb (while talking about sth else)
to read aloud/to recite rhythmically/to chant/to intone (esp. poems in rhythm)
to read again/to review (a lesson etc)
to recite or chant Buddhist scripture
true statement/incantation (translates Sanskrit: dharani 陀羅尼|陀罗尼)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
to read a book/to study/to attend school
Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
pinyin: an3 ma5 ni2 ba1 mi1 hong1
